Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute near State/75th
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted WB: 75th, King Drive, 76th, Lafayette, 75th; EB: 75th, State, 76th, King Drive, 75th due to, street blockage near State/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/75th, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 75th, King Drive, 76th, Lafayette, and 75th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 75th, State, 76th, King Drive, and 75th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Northbound #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 75th, Vincennes, 71st, and State due to, street blockage near State/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 75th, Vincennes, 71st, and State due to, street blockage near State/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange and 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange and 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/ residual delays after an earlier door problem on a train at Roosevelt. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Orange and 63rd-bound Green Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier door problem on a train at Roosevelt.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
Allow extra travel time.
